meanings.sent1: I need to winterize my car by putting on snow tires.
meanings.sent2: The farmer winterized the irrigation system to prevent freezing.
meanings.sent3: I tried to winterize my wardrobe by adding more sweaters.
meanings.sent4: She winterized her garden by covering the plants with mulch.
meanings.sent5: Remember to winterize your home by sealing any drafts.

meanings.sent1: The homeowners winterized their pipes to prevent them from freezing.
meanings.sent2: It's important to winterize your outdoor plants to keep them alive.
